Module applications
Package applications.database_console_application

Class DBDemo

java.lang.Object
applications.database_console_application.DBDemo
public class DBDemo extends Object
The DBDemo class demonstrates operations with the MySQL database. It handles data related to metro stations and their operational hours.

  • Method Details

    • determineLogger

      public static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger determineLogger()
      Determines and returns an appropriate logger based on the package of the calling class. If the calling class belongs to "applications.database_console_application" package, returns a logger configured for that package. If it belongs to "applications.database_gui_application" package, returns a logger configured for that package. Otherwise, returns the root logger.
      Returns:
      Logger instance based on the package of the calling class.

    • createMetroStations

      public static MetroStations createMetroStations()
      Creates a MetroStations object and populates it with sample data for demonstration purposes.
      Returns:
      a MetroStations object containing sample data.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Demonstrates the program functionality. Data is imported from a JSON file, various operations are performed, and the results are exported to another JSON file.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)
